section.p: There is a gasp from everyone present when you unroll your cape and show what you have brought.
‘It is a marvel!’ cries Vanna, leaping to her feet. ‘Truly you are as great as any knight of this court.’

Also, Vanna takes her sword and knights you on the spot. You are given the title Paladin of Ravayne and assured that you will always be welcome here. Note in the Titles box on your Adventure Sheet.
